name: Mobile App for Concert Goers - Product Design Interview Exercise
description:
Backstory

During the search of new opportunities, I’ve done few design exercises as a part of the interview process. After completing those designs, those files been left on Figma for nothing, so here I would like to share the files I created to tackle the design exercise, demonstrate my design work and thinking in a different fashion - So those are real life design challenges from some product-based companies.


Project

We're designing a geo-location-based, photo sharing Mobile app for music concerts. Its purpose is to let the concert goers share the photos/videos taken during the event with the organizer and other concert attendees while at the event. You have been given a very rough wireframe from the UX team, with rudimentary requirements.


Task

To provide hi-fi mockups of the following wireframes of the “Share Photos and Videos” screens. Explain and present the decision making of the design.


Focus

This design exercise is less on completion but more on design intentions and problem solving for the purpose of this exercise. 


Feedback welcome, HMU!
